reviewText: Was expecting a dumb sex comedy, but it actually was more enjoyable and had a lot of heart, and some great acting.

I have been wanting to watch this for a while.  I expected a reallt sexy movie; but it was not at all what I expected.  It turned out to be a really nice love story.  It had no bad language and only a couple of suggestive scenes.  The outtakes were sexier than the movie.  The intimate scenes were like 50's or 60's scenes.  The movie was not ruined by putting in scenes to make it a higher rating but that had nothing to add to the story.  Some of the cinematography was really impressive.  Even the jacket picture is more suggestive than the movie. if you are looking for a sex-filled movie, this is NOT it.  If you are looking for a good different growing up love story, you'll enjoy this.

Just watched this with my girlfriend out of curiosity because of the name. Expected a raunchy flick and instead it was really good and funny film with a real happy ending. Definitely a date film or one to just want when you want a  laugh.
